name: Scratch Shooter (NickGamesG)
description:
Instructions:
Hold Up or W to move.
Click to shoot the stars.
Try to beat the high score.

Please note this is just for testing what a shooter game on Scratch would be like. If you have any ideas in mind you want me to create, let me know in the comments and I will turn it into a real game. This game is a bit laggy if your running a slow browser.

Update 1: Added Pew sound to laser.
Update 2: Fixed sound issues, custom cursor and replaced monitors with text.
